short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto-generate step-by-step guide with demo ready video

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview:

Welcome to Yishow, a groundbreaking production by ByteYi Labs Inc that revolutionizes the way step-by-step guides are created. With the power of Yishow, users can effortlessly auto-generate comprehensive guides in both video and text formats.

Key Features:
* Auto-generate how-to guide with video while walk through the process
* Auto-generate voice over without recording your own 
* Redact sensitive information
* Sharable everywhere
* Export to video & PDF
* Tons of customization & actions for post capture editing
